meanings.definition: A type of caterpillar that spins webs on plants.
meanings.sent1: The webworms were busy spinning their webs on the leaves.
meanings.sent2: I saw some webworms creating silk threads on the flowers.
meanings.sent3: The webworms seemed to be having a party on the bushes with their webs.
meanings.sent4: The garden looked like a webworms' paradise with all the silk decorations.
meanings.sent5: The delicate webs of the webworms shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The larvae of certain moths that create silken webs on trees.
meanings.sent1: We observed the webworms crawling on the branches, leaving behind their silky trails.
meanings.sent2: The webworms were busy weaving their webs high up in the trees.
meanings.sent3: It was like a tiny circus in the forest with the acrobatic webworms performing on the tree trunks.
meanings.sent4: The forest canopy was draped in the intricate tapestries of the webworms.
meanings.sent5: The webworms' silken creations swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A group of insects known for their web-building behavior.
meanings.sent1: The garden was teeming with webworms constructing their intricate webs.
meanings.sent2: The webworms worked together to build a massive web that covered the entire bush.
meanings.sent3: The webworms were like architects, designing their webs with precision and skill.
meanings.sent4: The field was a maze of webs, each crafted by a different group of webworms.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns of the webworms' webs fascinated onlookers.
